title.narrative: Civic Engagement Alliance in the Netherlands and EU

description.narrative: ICCO Global Office contributes to the implementation of the program of the Civic Engagement Alliance. Global program management lies with ICCO GO (department Communication, Strategy and External Relations). ICCO also contributes to policy influencing in the Netherlands and at International level. Lobbyists and thematic experts cooperate in a joint lobby team in the Netherlands.

title.narrative: Copy of IATI-CEA Annual report 2018.pdf
